InstanceID: <--- CHANGE THIS TO YOUR INSTANCE ID --->

columns.name: RankCustDate
columns.expression:
RANKX(
    FILTER(
        SalesPivot,
        SalesPivot[CustomerKey] = EARLIER( SalesPivot[CustomerKey] )
    ),
    SalesPivot[OrderDate],
    ,
    ASC,
    DENSE
)

columns.name: OrderDateAfterFirstDate
columns.expression:
VAR CurrentCustomerKey = SalesPivot[CustomerKey]
VAR FirstOrderDate =
    CALCULATE(
        MIN( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ),
        FILTER(
            SalesPivot,
            SalesPivot[CustomerKey] = CurrentCustomerKey
                && SalesPivot[RankCustDate] = 1
        )
    )
VAR OrderAfterFirstDate =
    CALCULATE(
        MIN( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ),
        FILTER(
            SalesPivot,
            SalesPivot[CustomerKey] = CurrentCustomerKey
                && SalesPivot[OrderDate] <> FirstOrderDate
        )
    )
RETURN
    IF(
        SalesPivot[RankCustDate] <> 1,
        BLANK( ),
        IF(
            ISBLANK( OrderAfterFirstDate ),
            BLANK( ),
            OrderAfterFirstDate
        )
    )

columns.name: OrderDateAfterFirstMonth
columns.expression:
VAR CurrentCustomerKey = SalesPivot[CustomerKey]
VAR FirstOrderDate =
    CALCULATE(
        MIN( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ),
        FILTER(
            SalesPivot,
            SalesPivot[CustomerKey] = CurrentCustomerKey
                && SalesPivot[RankCustDate] = 1
        )
    )
VAR FirstOrderMonth = MONTH( FirstOrderDate )
VAR FirstOrderYear = YEAR( FirstOrderDate )
VAR OrderAfterFirstMonth =
    CALCULATE(
        MIN( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ),
        FILTER(
            SalesPivot,
            SalesPivot[CustomerKey] = CurrentCustomerKey
                && ( MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) <> FirstOrderMonth
                || YEAR( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) <> FirstOrderYear )
        )
    )
RETURN
    IF(
        SalesPivot[RankCustDate] <> 1,
        BLANK( ),
        IF(
            ISBLANK( OrderAfterFirstMonth ),
            BLANK( ),
            OrderAfterFirstMonth
        )
    )

columns.name: FlagWithin90Days
columns.expression:
VAR DaysBetweenFirstAndSecond =
    SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstDate] - SalesPivot[OrderDate]
RETURN
    IF(
        NOT ( ISBLANK( SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstDate] ) )
            && NOT ( ISBLANK( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) )
            && SalesPivot[RankCustDate] = 1
            && DaysBetweenFirstAndSecond > 0
            && DaysBetweenFirstAndSecond <= 90,
        1,
        BLANK( )
    )

columns.name: FlagWithin3Months
columns.expression:
IF(
    NOT ( ISBLANK( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) )
        && NOT ( ISBLANK( SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstMonth] ) )
        && ( ( YEAR( SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstMonth] )
        = YEAR( SalesPivot[OrderDate] )
        && MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstMonth] )
        > MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDate] )
        && MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstMonth] )
        <= MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) + 3 )
        || ( MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) > 9
        && YEAR( SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstMonth] )
        = YEAR( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) + 1
        && MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDateAfterFirstMonth] )
        <= ( MONTH( SalesPivot[OrderDate] ) + 3 ) - 12 ) ),
    1,
    BLANK( )
)

measures.name: % Returned in 3mo
measures.description: Percentage of customers that returned within 3 months (after) their first purchase month

measures.name: % Returned in 90d
measures.description: Percentage of customers that returned within 90 days (after) their first purchase date

measures.name: CountWithin3Months
measures.description: Count of customers that returned within 3 months (after) their first purchase month

measures.name: CountWithin90Days
measures.description: Count of customers that returned within 90 days (after) their first purchase date
